scripts.clean: node --input-type=module -e "import fs from 'fs'; import path from 'path'; import { fileURLToPath } from 'url'; const __dirname = path.dirname(fileURLToPath(import.meta.url)); const viteCache = path.join(process.cwd(), 'node_modules', '.vite'); if (fs.existsSync(viteCache)) { fs.rmSync(viteCache, { recursive: true, force: true }); console.log('✅ Vite cache cleared!'); } else { console.log('ℹ️  No Vite cache found.'); }"
